mapper.select: SELECT shielId, terminal, shielType, site, qid, adPosition, adLevel, adStyle, pageType, pageNum, area, areaTime, cycleStartTime, cycleEndTime, planStartTime, planEndTime, qidState, siteState, creatTime, updateTime, operator, other, isReverse, sectors FROM adplatform_conf_shielarea WHERE siteState = 1 AND qidState = 1 AND (CASE WHEN (planStartTime<>'' AND planStartTime<>'0000-00-00' AND planEndTime<>'' AND planEndTime<>'0000-00-00') THEN NOW() BETWEEN planStartTime AND planEndTime ELSE 1=1 END) AND (CASE WHEN cycleStartTime<>'00:00:00' AND cycleEndTime<>'00:00:00' THEN NOW() BETWEEN cycleStartTime AND cycleEndTime ELSE 1=1 END) ORDER BY shielType ASC, site ASC, qid ASC
SELECT namecode, name FROM adplatform_basicdictionary WHERE type = 'sectors' AND flag = 1
SELECT NAME, CODE FROM adplatform_mobile_vendor WHERE code NOT IN ( SELECT namecode FROM adplatform_basicdictionary WHERE type = 'vendor' )
